CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Innovations relative to Luminara R&D?
SRP.A: Nova Innovations is {above} Luminara R&D in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Analytics relative to Nova Innovations?
SRP.A: Crimson Analytics is {below} Nova Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Analytics relative to Luminara R&D?
SRP.A: Crimson Analytics is {below} Luminara R&D in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Innovations}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Analytics}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara R&D's minimum Innovation Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara R&D's minimum Innovation Index is in {2015}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Innovations's minimum Innovation Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Innovations's minimum Innovation Index is in {2017}.

NC.Q: Was the total Innovation Index in 2014 higher or lower than in 2022?
NC.A: The total innovation index in 2014 was {higher} than in 2022.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2003, did the total Innovation Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2020 and 2021?
NC.A: The change in total innovation index between 2002 and 2003 was {larger} than between 2020 and 2021.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2023, did the total Innovation Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2011 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total innovation index between 2004 and 2023 was {larger} than between 2011 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2019, did the total Innovation Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2013 and 2020?
NC.A: The change in total innovation index between 2008 and 2019 was {larger} than between 2013 and 2020.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Innovations} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Analytics and Nova Innovations first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Analytics and Nova Innovations first exchanged leading positions in {2010}.
